title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Spaghetti Carbonara requires spaghetti, eggs, Parmesan cheese, pancetta, black pepper, and salt.
instructions: Cook spaghetti al dente and reserve some pasta water. Whisk eggs, Parmesan, and pepper in a bowl. Cook pancetta until crisp. Add drained spaghetti to the pancetta fat. Remove from heat and slowly pour egg mixture over pasta, whisking constantly. Add reserved pasta water for desired consistency. Toss in pancetta and serve immediately, topped with more Parmesan cheese if desired.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala

ingredient: To make Chicken Tikka Masala, you'll need chicken breasts, yogurt, spices like turmeric, cumin, and garam masala, tomatoes, cream, and butter.
